The primary objective study identify factor associate awareness utilization discount generic prescription program two low-income population Houston utilize $ 4 30-day supply $ 10 90-day supply , Generic Prescriptions Program offer Kroger , Randalls , Target , Walmart , HEB , CVS , Walgreens .
DOC.detailed_description: If agree take part study , take part focus group . The focus group consist 8 people discuss beliefs generic medication , awareness discount generic prescription program , use discount generic prescription program . The focus group last 90 minute . During focus group , complete form ask basic demographic information ( age sex ) . The focus group discussion tap , record tape transcribe word-for-word . The taped recording focus group study store safe secure locker study chair . The taped recording destroy 5 year . Length Study : Your participation study end complete focus group . This investigational study .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 old Lowincome ( less $ 30,000/year ) Ability speak English Ability read write English Chronic health condition require prescription medication family member chronic health condition require prescription medication .
